alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Seneca (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:49PM EDT until September 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL SENECA AND SOUTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... At 549 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Levanna, or 11 miles south of Auburn, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Seneca Falls, Romulus, Fayette, Owasco, Fleming, Genoa, Ledyard, Moravia, and Union Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
